participant_id.Description: Unique participant identifier in the format sub-XXX.

age.Description: Age of the participant in years.

arm_top.Description: Indicates which arm was on top in a crossed posture.

length_lower_arm.Description: Length of the participant's lower arm in centimeters.

run.Description: Run number in the experiment (e.g., first, second, etc.).

posture.Description: Posture of the participant during the task.

stim_side.Description: Whether the two stimuli where on the same anatomical body side (e.g., both on the left arm).

Levels.same: stimuli presented on same body side
Levels.different: stimuli presented across different body sides

stim_segment.Description: Whether the stimuli were presented within the same type of anatomical segment (upper arm or lower arm

Levels.same: stimuli presented within same arm segment
Levels.different: stimuli presented across different arm segments

soa.Description: Stimulus onset asynchrony (the time difference between the two stimuli's onsets) in milliseconds.

tactor1side.Description: The antomical body side where the first tactor was applied.

tactor1segment.Description: The arm segment where the first stimulus was applied.

tactor2side.Description: The antomical body side where the second tactor was applied.

tactor2segment.Description: The arm segment where the second stimulus was applied.

response_correct.Description: Indicates whether the response was correct.

session.Description: Session identifier. There was one session only.

trial.Description: Overall trial number across the entire experiment.
